content:
<size=30>Just as I hypothesized, this is brimming with research potential...</size>
Ah, pardon me, I got carried away talking to myself.
Please disregard what I just said.

Welcome to the Omni-Gallery. I presume you're here for a visit?
Please feel free to look around~ (Multiplayer Chat Test - Client)

Judging by your expression, I assume you're wondering
"Where to Find Fantastic Beasts"?

The meaning, origin, and humor of this joke actually—
*Ahem*, pardon my impropriety.
In any case, I hope you enjoy your time here.

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
Welcome to this sanctuary teeming with wondrous creatures.

Based on morphological characteristics,
you must be the contact's friend,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, correct?
